languages.text: {n}Лицо старика растягивается в странной улыбке.{/n} "Я сделал для Руолдо тысячи статуй. Но каменная плоть Тассеры не в силах утолить его амбиции".
{n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh can never seem to sate his great ambitions."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо старика растягивается в странной улыбке.{/n} "Я сделал для Руолдо тысячи статуй. Но каменная плоть Тассеры не в силах утолить его амбиции".

traits.locale_text: {n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh cannot sate his ambitions."
{n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh cannot sate his ambitions."
{n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh can never quite sate his great ambitions."

{n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but his desires are hungrier than a storm. Each carved destiny he struggled to re-mould. And he broke the last one."
{n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh can never seem to sate his great ambitions."
{n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh can never seem to sate his great ambitions."
{n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh can never quite sate his great ambitions."

languages.text: {n}雕刻师嘴角露出了神秘的微笑。{/n}“我为罗尔多雕刻了成千上万座雕像，但塔瑟拉水晶制成的躯体，似乎无法满足他伟大的野心。”
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh can never seem to sate his great ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}雕刻师嘴角露出了神秘的微笑。{/n}“我为罗尔多雕刻了成千上万座雕像，但塔瑟拉水晶制成的躯体，似乎无法满足他伟大的野心。”

languages.text: {n}Su boca se estira hasta esbozar una sonrisa enigmática.{/n} «He esculpido miles de estatuas para Ruoldo, pero la carne pétrea de Thassera nunca satisface su desmesurada ambición».
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh can never seem to sate his great ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su boca se estira hasta esbozar una sonrisa enigmática.{/n} «He esculpido miles de estatuas para Ruoldo, pero la carne pétrea de Thassera nunca satisface su desmesurada ambición».

languages.text: {n}Ağzı, gizemli bir gülümsemeyle geriliyor.{/n} "Ruoldo için binlerce heykel yaptım ama Thassera'nın taş eti, onun büyük hırslarını doyurmaya yetmiyor."
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh can never seem to sate his great ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ağzı, gizemli bir gülümsemeyle geriliyor.{/n} "Ruoldo için binlerce heykel yaptım ama Thassera'nın taş eti, onun büyük hırslarını doyurmaya yetmiyor."

languages.text: {n}彼の口はもったいぶった笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「わしはルオルドのために数千の像を作成しましたが、タッセーラの石は、彼の偉大な野望を十分に満足させないようです」
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh can never seem to sate his great ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の口はもったいぶった笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「わしはルオルドのために数千の像を作成しましたが、タッセーラの石は、彼の偉大な野望を十分に満足させないようです」

languages.text: {n}Ses lèvres s'étendent en un sourire mystérieux.{/n} « J'ai façonné des milliers de statues de Ruoldo, mais même la chair rocheuse de Thassera semble bien incapable de mesurer toute l'ampleur de son ambition. »
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh can never seem to sate his great ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses lèvres s'étendent en un sourire mystérieux.{/n} « J'ai façonné des milliers de statues de Ruoldo, mais même la chair rocheuse de Thassera semble bien incapable de mesurer toute l'ampleur de son ambition. »

languages.text: {n}Er verzieht den Mund zu einem kryptischen Lächeln.{/n} "Ich habe tausende von Statuen für Ruoldo angefertigt, doch das Steinfleisch von Thassera kann seine gewaltigen Ambitionen wohl niemals befriedigen."
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth stretches into a cryptic smile.{/n} "I have made thousands of statues for Ruoldo, but Thassera's stone flesh can never seem to sate his great ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er verzieht den Mund zu einem kryptischen Lächeln.{/n} "Ich habe tausende von Statuen für Ruoldo angefertigt, doch das Steinfleisch von Thassera kann seine gewaltigen Ambitionen wohl niemals befriedigen."
